item.description: Note we're meeting on a Monday night instead of Wednesday this time! They'll be a slight cost to cover expenses ($2 to $3 )
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the same place in Scarborough and if you're new we'll send address when you sign up.
item.why: We'll listen to an inspirational clip or two to encourage our conversations while raising everyone's vibrations! By staying connected with like-minded people we'll walk away being more mindful of what we really want and what we're grateful for...
item.name: Let's stay connected and bring your great vibrations to our rich discussions.
